text:
varu#Na(gm) suShuvAqNamaqnnAdyaqM nOpA#namaqth sa EqtAM ~MvA#ruqNIM kRuqShNAM ~MvaqSAma#paSyaqt tA(gg) svAyai# dEqvatA#yAq Ala#Bataq tatOq vai tamaqnnAd-yaqmupA#namaqd-yamala#maqnnAdyA#yaq santa#maqnnAdyaqM nOpaqnamEqth sa EqtAM 
~MvA#ruqNIM kRuqShNAM ~MvaqSAmA la#BEtaq varu#NamEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmAq annaqM pra ya#cCatyannAqda - [  ]  53
